content: I don't have personal preferences. however, if you're looking for a beautiful and historic park with plenty of cultural attractions nearby, then i recommend starting with the boston common. it is the oldest public park in the united states and has many interesting features and things to do, such as the swan boats, the frog pond, various memorials, and gardens. moreover, it's located in the heart of the city, which means you can easily access other attractions in the area.
